Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

KSVTKTrackPainter.cxx
1 #include "KSVTKTrackPainter.h"
2 #include "KSVisualizationMessage.h"
3 
4 #include "KSReadFileROOT.h"
5 #include "KRootFile.h"
6 
7 #include "vtkPointData.h"
8 #include "vtkPolyLine.h"
9 
10 using namespace std;
11 
12 namespace Kassiopeia
13 {
14  KSVTKTrackPainter::KSVTKTrackPainter() :
15  fPoints( vtkSmartPointer< vtkPoints >::New() ),
16  fLines( vtkSmartPointer< vtkCellArray >::New() ),
17  fColors( vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New() ),
18  fData( vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyData >::New() ),
19  fMapper( vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyDataMapper >::New() ),
20  fTable( vtkSmartPointer< vtkLookupTable >::New() ),
21  fActor( vtkSmartPointer< vtkActor >::New() )
22  {
23  fColors->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
24  fData->SetPoints( fPoints );
25  fData->SetLines( fLines );
26  fData->GetPointData()->SetScalars( fColors );
27  fTable->SetNumberOfTableValues( 256 );
28  fTable->SetHueRange( 0.000, 0.667 );
29  fTable->SetRampToLinear();
30  fTable->SetVectorModeToMagnitude();
31  fTable->Build();
32 #ifdef VTK6
33  fMapper->SetInputData( fData );
34 #else
35  fMapper->SetInput( fData );
36 #endif
37  fMapper->SetScalarModeToUsePointData();
38  fMapper->SetLookupTable( fTable );
39  fMapper->SetColorModeToMapScalars();
40  fMapper->ScalarVisibilityOn();
41  fActor->SetMapper( fMapper );
42  }
43  KSVTKTrackPainter::~KSVTKTrackPainter()
44  {
45  }
46 
47  void KSVTKTrackPainter::Render()
48  {
49  KRootFile* tRootFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( fFile );
50  if( !fPath.empty() )
51  {
52  tRootFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
53  }
54 
55  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
56  if (! tReader.TryFile( tRootFile ))
57  {
58  vismsg( eWarning ) << "Could not open file <" << tRootFile->GetName() << ">" << eom;
59  return;
60  }
61 
62  tReader.OpenFile( tRootFile );
63 
64  KSReadRunROOT& tRun = tReader.GetRun();
65  KSReadEventROOT& tEvent = tReader.GetEvent();
66  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrack = tReader.GetTrack();
67  KSReadStepROOT& tStep = tReader.GetStep();
68 
69  KSReadObjectROOT& tPointObject = tStep.GetObject( fPointObject );
70  const KSThreeVector& tPointVariable = tPointObject.Get< KSThreeVector >( fPointVariable );
71 
72  KSReadObjectROOT& tColorObject = tStep.GetObject( fColorObject );
73  const KSDouble& tColorVariable = tColorObject.Get< KSDouble >( fColorVariable );
74 
75  bool tActive;
76  vector< vtkIdType > tIds;
77 
78  for( unsigned int tRunIndex = 0; tRunIndex <= tRun.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunIndex++ )
79  {
80  tRun << tRunIndex;
81  for( unsigned int tEventIndex = tRun.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventIndex <= tRun.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventIndex++ )
82  {
83  tEvent << tEventIndex;
84  for( long tTrackIndex = tEvent.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackIndex <= tEvent.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackIndex++ )
85  {
86  tTrack << tTrackIndex;
87 
88  tActive = false;
89 
90  for( long tStepIndex = tTrack.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepIndex <= tTrack.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepIndex++ )
91  {
92  tStep << tStepIndex;
93 
94  if( tActive == false )
95  {
96  if( (tPointObject.Valid() == true) && (tColorObject.Valid() == true) )
97  {
98  vismsg_debug( "output became active at <" << tStepIndex << ">" << eom );
99 
100  fColors->InsertNextValue( tColorVariable.Value() );
101  tIds.push_back( fPoints->InsertNextPoint( tPointVariable.Value().X(), tPointVariable.Value().Y(), tPointVariable.Value().Z() ) );
102 
103  tActive = true;
104  }
105  }
106  else
107  {
108  if( (tPointObject.Valid() == true) && (tColorObject.Valid() == true) )
109  {
110  fColors->InsertNextValue( tColorVariable.Value() );
111  tIds.push_back( fPoints->InsertNextPoint( tPointVariable.Value().X(), tPointVariable.Value().Y(), tPointVariable.Value().Z() ) );
112  }
113  else
114  {
115  vismsg_debug( "output became inactive at <" << tStepIndex << ">" << eom );
116 
117  if( tIds.empty() == false )
118  {
119  vismsg_debug( "making polyline of <" << tIds.size() << "> points" << eom );
120 
121  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tIds.size(); tIndex++ )
122  {
123  vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine > tPolyLine = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine >::New();
124  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds( tIds.size() );
125  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tIds.size(); tIndex++ )
126  {
127  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetId( tIndex, tIds.at( tIndex ) );
128  }
129  tIds.clear();
130  fLines->InsertNextCell( tPolyLine );
131  }
132  }
133 
134  tActive = false;
135  }
136  }
137 
138  }
139 
140  if( tIds.empty() == false )
141  {
142  vismsg_debug( "making polyline of <" << tIds.size() << "> points" << eom );
143 
144  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tIds.size(); tIndex++ )
145  {
146  vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine > tPolyLine = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine >::New();
147  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds( tIds.size() );
148  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tIds.size(); tIndex++ )
149  {
150  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetId( tIndex, tIds.at( tIndex ) );
151  }
152  tIds.clear();
153  fLines->InsertNextCell( tPolyLine );
154  }
155  }
156  }
157  }
158  }
159 
160  tReader.CloseFile();
161 
162  delete tRootFile;
163 
164  fMapper->SetScalarRange( fColors->GetRange() );
165  fMapper->Update();
166 
167  return;
168  }
169 
170  void KSVTKTrackPainter::Display()
171  {
172  if( fDisplayEnabled == true )
173  {
174  vtkSmartPointer< vtkRenderer > vRenderer = fWindow->GetRenderer();
175  vRenderer->AddActor( fActor );
176  }
177 
178  return;
179  }
180 
181  void KSVTKTrackPainter::Write()
182  {
183  if( fWriteEnabled == true )
184  {
185  string tFile;
186 
187  if( fOutFile.length() > 0 )
188  {
189  if( !fPath.empty() )
190  {
191  tFile = string( fPath ) + string( "/" ) + fOutFile;
192  }
193  else
194  {
195  tFile = string( OUTPUT_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/" ) + fOutFile;
196  }
197  }
198  else
199  {
200  if( !fPath.empty() )
201  {
202  tFile = string( fPath ) + string( "/" ) + GetName() + string( ".vtp" );
203  }
204  else
205  {
206  tFile = string( OUTPUT_DEFAULT_DIR ) + string( "/" ) + GetName() + string( ".vtp" );
207  }
208  }
209 
210  vismsg( eNormal ) << "vtk track painter <" << GetName() << "> is writing <" << fData->GetNumberOfCells() << "> cells to file <" << tFile << ">" << eom;
211 
212  vtkSmartPointer< vtkXMLPolyDataWriter > vWriter = fWindow->GetWriter();
213  vWriter->SetFileName( tFile.c_str() );
214  vWriter->SetDataModeToBinary();
215 #ifdef VTK6
216  vWriter->SetInputData( fData );
217 #else
218  vWriter->SetInput( fData );
219 #endif
220  vWriter->Write();
221  }
222  return;
223  }
224 
225 }
